title: Need help
body: I recently went afk because of bad internet connection it's my first time going afk i had a pop up window stating the penalty of going afk and to continue type √è Agree" I did just that but now the window just won't close any idea how I can fix this?

replies.body: Hmmmm it looks like that I had a slight accent over it, which maaaaaay be messing up that submit button. Make sure you're typing "I Agree" exactly how it's prompted in the notification.
